column2: iha yadyapi bahulaṃ sahacāramātraṃ kāryasya prayatnavatā darśitam, darśitaś ca tadabhāve kvacid abhāvaḥ, tathāpi pratibandhāsiddheḥ kāryam api syāt, na ca buddhimatkartṛpūrvakam ityāśaṅkā bādhavaidhuryāt kāryaṃ buddhim iti sādhye sandigdhavipakṣavyāvṛttiko hetvābhāsaḥ | na ca sapakṣavipakṣayor darśanādarśanamātreṇa sādhanasya bhāve sādhyasyāvaśyam bhāvaḥ, sādhyābhāve vā tadabhāva ity evaṃ rūpāyā vyāpteḥ pratibandhaśabdavācyāyāḥ sādhanaṃ bhavitum arhati, bhāvivyabhicāradarśaṇeṣv api tathopalabdheḥ | kim idam idānīm adarśanam abhāvād eva vyabhicārasya, atha darśanasāmagrīsamavadhānavirahād iti nirṇetum aśakyam eva sahacāramātradarśino vimarśaśīlasya |

column2: ata eva Vācaspateḥ svābhāvikasambandhaghoṣaṇam api śabdapuṣṭimātram, tadatiriktārthāpoṣaṇāt | bhūyodarśane hi vyabhicārādarśane svābhāvikavyavasthā | vyabhicārādarśanaṃ ca vipakṣe 'darśanamātram uktaṃ bhavati | yat punar etad upādher anupalambhena vyabhicārāsiddhir iti, tatra nopādhir nāma dṛśyacihnasthānīyaṃ kiñcid asti, yad anupalambho 'vyabhicāraṃ vyavahārayet | kiṃ tu vyabhicāradarśanamātreṇaiva tatparikalpaḥ | tadadarśanāt ca svābhāvikatvam iti viśeṣābhāvāt na svābhāvikavādena kiñcit, sādhyena saha bhūyo dṛṣṭo hetur vyabhicāre ca na hetur itīyataiva paryāptatvāt | etac ca sarvaṃ vyāpticarcāyāṃ vivicya kvacid arthāntarasya pratibandho nāma tadutpattim antareṇa, sā ca pratyakṣānupalambhasādhanenaiveti vyavasthāpitam iti tat evāvadhāryam | etena śaṃkaraVācaspatimatāvalambinaḥ pratyuktāḥ |

column2: astu tarhi prayatnavatāpi kāryasya tadutpattilakṣaṇa eva pratibandho dhūmasyeva vahninā | yathoktaṃ vittokena | tathā hi kumbhakāravyāpārāt prāk mṛtpiṇḍadaṇḍacakrādiṣu satsv api kāryaṃ kumbhākhyam upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptam anupalabdhaṃ tadvyāpārānantaram upalabhyata iti hetuphalabhāvasiddhau kuto vipakṣavyāvṛttisandehaḥ? satyam atra pakṣavipakṣavṛttir eva na sandehaḥ, atra hi pratyakṣānupalambhayogyasvarūpasvīkārād abhivyakto 'nupalabdhapuruṣavyāpārair vṛkṣavīraṇādibhir vyabhicāraḥ | pakṣīkṛtāstṛṇādayaḥ, na ca pakṣīkṛtenaiva

column2: iti nyāyaḥ | adhyakṣam eva pratiyoginaḥ pratiyogyantarāpekṣayānupalabdhir ucyate | tato 'nupalabdhibādhitam api pratyakṣabādhitam eva | vyavahārasādhanāpekṣayā tu sānumānam | na cānumānabādhite 'py anyāvakāśaḥ | sā tarhi dṛśyaviśeṣaṇāpannasyaivābhāvaṃ vyavahārayati, dṛśyādṛśyaśarīretarasādhāraṇaṃ ca buddhimattvam iti dṛśyatāniyamānupapatter buddhimataḥ katham anupalabdhimātreṇa tṛṇādijanmani niṣedhaḥ? tataḥ sandehāt pakṣīkaraṇaṃ nyāyyam iti cet? tad etad vikrītagavīrakṣaṇam | vyāptisādhanāyādhyakṣānupalabdhyor avakāśadānād eva dṛśyaviṣayatāsvīkārasya prasahyāyātatvāt | na hy adṛśye pratyakṣam anvayasādhanam anupalabdhir vā vyatirekasādhanī bhavitum arhati | tad ayaṃ bhede saty anvayavyatirekarūpam adhyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ hetuphalabhāvam avataran na dṛśyatām ativartituṃ sādhyasya śaktaḥ | dṛśyatve ca niyatatṛṇādinā vyabhicāra iti sādharaṇānekāntaḥ ||

column2: atha vyabhicāracamatkārād adhyakṣāgocareṇa prayatnavatā vyāptiṃ gṛhṇīyāt? gṛhṇātu, na tu pratyakṣānupalambhāśrayaḥ śreyān asya | nanu dṛśyādṛśyaviśeṣaṇam anapekṣya prekṣāvanmātreṇa vyāptigrahaḥ? naivam, tāvatāpi hi pratyakṣakṛtāyā vyāpter anavakāśa eva | dṛśyaikasvabhāvaniyatā hi sā kathaṃ dṛśyādṛśyaviṣayā bhavet? tad dhi dṛśyam adṛśyaṃ ca rūpam ekabuddhimattvādidharmānuvṛttāv api svabhāvaviprakarṣetarābhyām atyantaṃ bhinnajātiḥ | tataḥ pratyakṣaṃ dṛśyaikajātisvīkāreṇa pravṛttam itaravārtānabhijñaṃ tadviśiṣṭam eva sādhāraṇam api dharmaṃ vyāpakam ādarśayati |

column2: yadyapi deśakālaviprakṛṣṭam api na dṛśyam, tathāpi tadarśanayogyatayaikajātyeveti (tadadarśanayogyatayaikajātyeveti) svabhāvaviprakṛṣṭasyaiva pratyakṣeṇa parihāraḥ | sarvānyavarjane hi svalakṣaṇaikaparyavasānād vyāptir eva na syāt, dhūmāgnivat, kampamārutavac ca | yathā hi svapravṛttiyogyajvalad bhāsurākārapuraskāreṇa pravartamānādhyakṣakṛtā vyāptiḥ saptārciṣi na jaṭharānalasādhāraṇarūpaparyavasāyinī, anyathā tārṇādibhedavad abhimate 'pi rūpe sandihāno na tatsādhyārthakriyālābhaikāgrabuddhiḥ pravarteta | pratibandhavaikalyavad vāsati jaṭharyatva ity āmṛśataḥ

column2: [245] pravṛttiḥ syāt | yathā vā pallavollāsena samīraṇena vyāptir adhyakṣajakṛtāspṛśyarūpapuraskārānnastimitamārutasādhāraṇarūpaparyavasāyinī, anyathādyāpi kisalayakampena mātariśvānam anumāpayan spṛśyaprabhañjanānurūpapravṛttinivṛttī niścayenācaret, tathā puruṣe 'pi pratyakṣakṛtā vyāpitāgṛhītir adṛśyarūpaparihāreṇaiva | tasmāt pratyakṣāvyājena yadi param iṣṭamātram eva sādhanaṃ nādhyakṣaṃ dṛśyādṛśyasāmānye 'pīti vyāpter abhāvāt sandigdhavipakṣavyāvṛttikatvam eva |

column2: prayogaḥ, yo yaḥ pratyakṣakṛtaḥ kāraṇatvaniścayaḥ, nāsau dṛśyādṛśyarūpaparyavasāyī, yathāgnau jaṭharajātajātavedaṛsādhāranarūpaṃ pariharan | pratyakṣakṛtaś cāsau buddhimatīti vyāpakaviruddhavyāptopalabdhiḥ | pratyakṣakṛtatvaṃ hi dṛśyaviṣayatvena vyāptam adṛśye tasyāpravṛtteḥ, tadviruddhaṃ dṛśyādṛśyaviṣayatvam, tadvyāptaṃ dṛśyādṛśyarūpaparyavasāyitvam | kiṃ ca yadi dṛśyādṛśyaviśeṣaṇam avadhūya dhīmanmātreṇa vyāptirvivakṣitā, evaṃ sati yadā buddhimadabhāve kumbhakāryasyābhāvam upadarśayed vyatirekapratipādanāya, tadā dṛśyādṛśyaviśeṣaṇarahitacetanamātrasyābhāvaḥ kena pramāṇena siddhaḥ, dṛśyānupalabdher dṛśyasyaiva pratiṣedhe 'dhikārāt? anyathā tṛṇādinā vyabhicārasyāśakyaparihāratvāc ca?

column2: na ca dṛśyapuruṣaviṣayaivānupalabdhir buddhimanmātrasya vyatirekabodhasādhanībhavitum arhati, ātyantikaviṣayabhedasya vyaktatvāt | anyathā tṛṇādijanmany api dṛśyapuruṣaviṣayaivānupalabdhis tadvyabhicārasthirīkaraṇakāraṇaṃ syāt | na hi lābhe praveśaś chede niṛsaraṇam iti nyāyam | tasmāt dṛśyaviśeṣaṇāpo@ṭhapakṣe vyāptigrahaṇakāle vyatirekagrahaṇopāyābhāvād avyāpteḥ punar api vipakṣavyāvṛttisandehaḥ | na ca nabhasy ubhayābhāvavibhāvanam upāyo vyatirekagrahaṇasya, kāryābhāvasya buddhimad vyāpārābhāvaprayuktatvaniścayānupapatteḥ | tadaparakāraṇasākalye hi tanmātrābhāve 'bhāvaḥ kāryasya tadabhāvaprayuktaḥ pratyetuṃ śakyaḥ | yathā tripañcakacintāyāṃ cintitam | dvayos tu kvacin nivṛttimātram akāryakāraṇabhūtayor api sulabham |

column2: kiṃ ca buddhimatkāraṇavyāpāravirahāt vihāyasi kāryatvābhāva uta kāraṇamātraviprayogād iti ko niṣṭaṅkaḥ? tathā ca sati viphalaḥ sakalo yatnaḥ | anvayo 'pi hi kāraṇamātreṇa kāryamātrasya gṛhyatām utasvit puruṣaviśeṣaṇena kāraṇeneti sandeha eva | atha dṛṣṭa evāyaṃ viśeṣaḥ kathaṃ parihartuṃ śakyaḥ, dhūme dahanātmavat | yady evaṃ dṛśyaśarīrarūpo

column2: [246] 'pi viśeṣaḥ pratīta eva, kathaṃ parihartuṃ śakyaḥ, citrabhānor bhāsurākāravat? sa tarhi viśeṣaḥ kāryeṇa vyabhicaryata iti cet? vyabhicaryatām | kārye 'pi kāraṇavad yathā pariṭṛṣṭaviśeṣaniṣṭha evānvayo bhavatu ghaṭavat saudhādāv api dṛṣṭatvād iti kiṃ niśchinnam? etac cānvayamātraṃ gajanimolitena dūṣaṇam avadhīryābhidhīyate | vastutas tu pratyakṣānupalambhayor ekasyāpi vyāpārāyogān nānvayo na vyatirekaḥ | asti ca kāryatvam urvīdharādau, na ca darśanātikrānte kartary anvayavyatirekau spṛśati | tādṛk cetanakṛtetaratvābhyāṃ ca rāśyantarābhāvād gandhādivad asādhāraṇānekānta eva | tasmān na pratyakṣeṇa kāryamātrasya vyāptigrahaṇam iti siddham |

column2: yātāś caivaṃ yad amī pratyakṣānupalambhāviśiṣṭakāryajātyullekhenaiva kāryakāraṇabhāvagrahaṇapravṛttayo na kāryamātrollekhena | tathā hi pratyakṣānupalambhapravṛttisamanantaram īdṛśāt jvaladbhāsurasvarūpavastuviśeṣād īdṛśaṃ dhavalimaliptakaṇṭhāmbakavikārakāri vastu jāyata ity anenākāraṇe hetuphalabhāvavyavahāraḥ sarvāparakāryakāraṇajātivyudāsena viśiṣṭam eva jātiyugmam ullikhan pravartate | iyam eva gatiḥ sarvatra hetuphalabhāvavyavahṛtau, īśvarānurodhāt tu prasiddhanyāyolla (prasiddhanyāyollaṅghanam etat) iti paśyāmaḥ |

column2: kaḥ punar atrāparādho yadi tārṇādibhedam udasya vahninā dhūmamātrasyeva bhūdharādibhedam apy udasya kāryamātrasya buddhimatā vyāptiṃ pratīyāt pratyakṣam? yathaiva tarhi varhiṣā kāryajātiviśeṣasya dhūmasyāvāntarasūkṣmajātimātram antarbhāvya vyāptigraho na tu tadvijātīyasparśaḥ, tathā buddhimatāpy astu vahnādeḥ | yathā vātyantavisadṛśor api kāryajātīḥ antarbhāvya bhūtimanmātrasya cetanena vyāptiṃ jighṛkṣasi, tathā vahnināpi gṛhṇīyāḥ | indriyapratyakṣasyaiva hi vyāpāra ubhayatra kathaṃ bhinnāṃ vṛttim āśrayeta? vyabhicāradarśanādarśanakṛto 'yaṃ vibhāga iti cet? tat tarhi darśanādarśanaṃ saṃkalpam anārūḍhaṃ gacchat tṛṇasaprśavad akiñcitkaram iti tad anurūpavimarśenāvaśyabhāvyam | na cāsti |

column2: na hi kaścid agnidhūmādiṣv anvayavyatirekagrāhipratyakṣānupalambhapravṛttau kāryajātiḥ akhilānalād utpadyata iti saṃkalpam anubhūya bhūyo vyabhicāradarśanāt yato vā kāryāntarāṇi vahnim antareṇāpy upalabdhāny upalabhyante vā tato dhūma evānena janyata iti niścayaṃ paricinoti, kiṃ tu jhagity eva pratyakṣānupalambhāntaram asmād agnyāder idaṃ dhūmādīti jātiviśeṣadvayaṃ hetuphalabhāvavyavahārabhājanīkurvann anubhūyate 'nusandhānapratyayaḥ | pratyakṣagocare

column2: [247] (anvayavyatirekayī R) na kaścid viśeṣaḥ | yadā ca vikalpāntarasthitasya jhagiti kaṇṭakād vyathety anupalambhapūrvakādhyakṣavihitā hetuphalabhāvagrāhiṇī matiḥ, tadābhivyakto vyabhicāradarśanavimarśavirahaḥ, samasamayāsambhavād vikalpānām | tad ihāpy asmāt śilpina idaṃ pṛthubudhnodarādyākāraṃ kāryam ity avāntarasūkṣmabhedamudasya vyavahāraḥ | yadā tu paṭaśakaṭādikam api puruṣād utpadyamānaṃ paśyati, tadedam apīdam api puruṣeṇa janyata iti matiravisaṃvādinī samudeti |

column2: kiṃ ca vyabhicāro nāma kiṃ siddhāyām eva vyāptāv anumānamātraṃ khaṇṭayati? atha vyāptir eva mithyeti vyavasthāpayati? atrāpi pakṣe svasāmarthyena sphuraty eva vyāptigrāhiṇi pramāṇe | yad vā tasyaiva prāmāṇyakṣayamādadhānaḥ, adyāpi sarvatra viṣaye niyate vā? niyate 'pi kim iṣṭivaśāt, atha pratyakṣasya tatraiva pravṛtteḥ? Prathamaḥ pakṣas tāvan na yukto virodhāt | na hi sādhyāvinābhāvalakṣaṇā ca vyāptir hetoḥ sādhyābhāvasaṃbhavakṛtaś cānumānābhāvaḥ saṅgacchate, anyatrāpi vyāptāvanāśvāsāc ca |

column2: evaṃ vyāptigrāhiṇi pramāṇe prāmāṇyād apracyutibhṛti vyāptimṛṣātvabodhanam apy asambaddhaṃ boddhavyam | sarvatra ca vyāptigrāhiṇaḥ prāmāṇyakṣaye dhūmād agnir api nānumātavyaḥ, anyasya vyāptigrāhiṇo 'bhāvāt | kimidānīṃ śaraṇam īśvarānumānasya bhaviṣyati? svecchayā ca niyate viṣaye vyāptivihitau pramāṇaṃ varākam udāsīnam iti na kaścit hetur ahetur vā tattvataḥ, dhūme 'pi svecchayā vyāptikhaṇṭanaprasaṅgāt | niyataviṣayatvaṃ tu vyabhicāragocarasyāpi pratyakṣasya katham, yāvatā yathā niyatajātipravṛttaṃ vyāptigrāhi sarvaviṣayam iṣṭam, tathā vyabhicāragocaram api sarvaviṣayam evānyūnānatiriktaśaktitvād ubhayoḥ? tad ekaviṣaya eva vyāptigraho vyabhicāravedanaṃ ceti kim adhunā sādhanam asādhanaṃ vā syāt? bhavatu vā bhavad uparodhād bādhabodhinaḥ pramāṇasya niyataviṣayatvam | tathāpi na khalu sakṛd eva vyabhicāravatāṃ bādhabodhaḥ, kiṃ tu krameṇa | tadā ca vyabhicāriṇām api vyabhicāradarśanam āhatya nāstīti dhūmasya tato viśeṣaṇābhāvāt punar ahetutvam, hetutvaṃ vānyasyāpi |

column2: [248] vyāptiviśrāma iti | vyabhicāraviṣayāṇām apy anantatvād deśādiviprakarṣavatāṃ gocarīkaraṇakālāpekṣayā puruṣāyuṣasya kanīyastvāt | tasmād vyabhicāradarśanavan niyataviṣaya eva vyāptigraho nirapavādaḥ, śuddhekādhyavasāyasya vibhāgena pravṛtteḥ | ata eva ca svābhāvikavikalpasyaiva kāryakāraṇabhāvagrahaṇe 'dhikāro naupādhikasya |

column2: asti hi śuddhaviṣayajanitālocanājñānamātrāpekṣo bālatiryaksādhāraṇo vikalpaḥ | sa śuddhaḥ svābhāvika iti cocyate, yadvaśāt paśavo 'pi kṣutpipāsāpraśamādisādhanāni tatraiva samarthānyavadhārayantaḥ punas tadanvitayā tathaiva tatas tatra pravartante, nivartante vānanvitayā | asti ca saṃketasmaraṇasacivālocanājñānajanito vikalpaḥ, yathā dīpāt kajjalamālokayato nīlam idaṃ rañjanādyupayogīty eva vikalpaḥ pūrvadṛṣṭārthakriyāsmaraṇasahāyānubhavabhāvitas tādṛgaupādhika ucyate | na ca tadā nīlavikalpa ity eva pradīpād akhilaṃ nīlam utpadyata iti prekṣaḥ kaścin niścinoti | kiṃ tu yad eva kajjalāvalokanamātrānurūpavikalpapuraskṛtaṃ vastu kajjalaśabdasaṃketayogyaṃ jātiyogāt svarūpaviśeṣād vā tad eva pradīpakāryaṃ vyabhicārālambane coktam |

column2: evaṃ dhūme 'pi dhavalam idaṃ vastu vahner jāyata iti saṃketānusārī vikalpa aupādhika evākṣipati kāryatvena tuhinādikam | śuddhe tu vikalpe dhūmajātir eva parisphuratīti tata eva tuhināder vyāptau nirāso na vyabhicārālambanaṃ sādhviti boddhavyam | tadvat kāryavikalpo 'pi sarvatra aupādhika eva | apekṣitaparavyāpāro hi svotpattāvandhaḥ | kāryam iti saṃketasmaraṇasahāyād indriyajñānād utpattir iti na hetuphalabhāvavyavahārasyāṅgam | tato yady api puruṣāt ghaṭodayadarśane ghaṭo 'yam asmād iti vikalpavat kāryam idam asmād ity api sulabho vikalpaḥ, tathāpi svābhāvikatvābhāvān na tatpuraskṛtasvarūpasya tatkāryatvavyavasthā | naisargikavikalpaviṣayīkṛtasya tu bhavatu |

column2: nanu śuddhāvasāyagocare 'pi vikalpaḥ saṃketasmṛtijanito dṛśyate 'yaṃ ghaṭaḥ pauruṣeya iti nāmollekhāt | tataḥ so 'py aupādhikaḥ prāptaḥ | na, tanmātravikalpane smaraṇasya aprayojakatvāt, vācakāṃśollekha eva tasya sāmarthyāt | yady api ca vācyavācakākārotkalitākhaṇṭavikalpodayaḥ smaraṇasāhāyakena, tathāpy apoṭdhāradvāreṇa tanmātre tadvyāpāra ucyate, mṛnmayatvamātre kulālasyeva | jātyantarasamavāyikāryatvadhavalatādidharmakalpanaṃ tu saṃketasambandhagrahaṇādiprācīnavyāpārasmaraṇam antareṇa śuddhādhyavasāyasya

column2: evaṃ tarhi vyabhicāradarśanena sādhāraṇānekāntavyavasthā duḥstheti cet? evam etad yadi buddhipāṭavaniyamaḥ sarveṣām | mandabuddhis tu sādṛśyādinā jātiviśeṣapravṛtte 'pi pratyakṣe jātyantareṇaikīkṛtya vyāptigrahaṇābhimānād anumānam ātiṣṭhamānaḥ paṭunā pareṇa vyabhicāram ādṛśya vyāptidurgraham āpādyate | ataḥ sādhāraṇānekāntavyavasthā | yathā dhūme pravṛtte 'pi pratyakṣe vyāptigrāhiṇy ucchaladbahalarūpam analavyāptim anusmaran mārutoddhūtadhūlipaṭalād analam anumāpayan vāṣpodayena prasiddhoṣarbudhavaidhuryeṇa vyabhicāram ādṛśya vāryate, tato 'pi kāraṇāt jātiviśeṣaviṣayaiva vyāptiḥ pratyakṣeṇa gṛhyata iti siddham |

column2: yadi hi dhūmaikajātipratibaddhapratibandhabodham adhyakṣam, tadā sādṛśyāpekṣo 'nyatra tadrūpāropaḥ, sadṛśāntaravyabhicāreṇa ca vāraṇaṃ yuktam | yadā tu kāryajātau sarvatra vyāptigrahaḥ, tadā kiṃ sādṛśyāpekṣayeti? yadi tarhi jātiviśeṣapratibaddha evādhyakṣeṇa pratibandhabodhaḥ katham atyantavijātīyo 'pi (atyantavijātiyā 'pi) ghaṭakuṭakuṇṭyādayaḥ sādhāraṇarāgayogino haridrādidravyasaṃskāram anumāpayanti? kathaṃ vā kuṭhārādi cchedakriyāyāṃ dṛṣṭavyāpāraṃ karaṇam atyantavijātīyāpi buddhiḥ kriyātvenānumāpayati?

column2: evam atyantavijātīyā api kailāsakuliśādayaḥ sādhāraṇakāryatvādidharmakāḥ puruṣam anumāpayiṣyantīti cet? naivam, vyāpyasya gamakatvāt, tad apekṣayaiva sajātīyavijātīyatāyāś cintyatvāt | vyāpyaṃ ca nirvartyavikāryakam āpekṣayā dvividhaṃ dharmirūpaṃ dharmarūpaṃ ca | tatra sarvathāpūṛvotpattau dharmiṇo vyāptir ucyate, dhūmādivat | tadā ca dhūmāntaram eva sajātīyam, vijātīyam anyad vastu | yadā tu pūṛvasthitasyaiva dharmāntarotpattivyavasāyaḥ, tadā dharmavyāptir ucyate, payasi auṣṇyādivat, tadā ca auṣṇyāntaram eva sajātīyo dharmaḥ, nādhunā dharmijāter apekṣā |

column2: evaṃ rāgo 'pi ghaṭakuṭādidravyavaijātyam avamatya svayaṃ svajātīyakāryāpekṣayaiva rāgadravyasaṃskārasya gamakaḥ | ata eva tadviśeṣe kvacit kuṅkumasya samparkaḥ kvacit haridrāder anumīyate | na caivaṃ pūṛvasthite bhūdharāmbhodharādau kāryatvādimātranirvartakaḥ puruṣa iṣṭaḥ, kiṃ tu kumbhādivad apūṛvakotpādaka eva | tadā ca dhūme dhavalatādivat kāryatādayaḥ

column2: [250] santo 'pi jātyantarasamavāyino dharmā vyāpter bahir bhāvād kiñcitkarā eva | tasmād dharmivastuvyāptigraho na dharmamātrapratyāsattim anurudhyate | nāpi dharmavyāpter dharmiṇaḥ sajātīyatām | śuddhaikavimarśāpekṣayā cā sajātīyetaravyavasthānam uktam | nāto rāgavad dharmivaijātye 'pi kāryatvādīnāṃ gamakatvam | anyathā pāṇḍudravyād api havyāśanānumānaprasaṅgo duṣpariharaḥ, vyabhicārottarasya dūṣitatvāt |

column2: indriye tv evam anumānam | yad anyakāraṇasannidhau kādācitkam, tat kāraṇāntarāpekṣam, yathā pāthaṛpṛthvīsannidhāvaṅkuraḥ, viṣayamanaskārālokasannidhau ca kādācitkī buddhir iti svabhāvahetuḥ | anapekṣatve vipakṣe kādācitka (kādācitkaṃ? ) virodhād anavasthāyīti bādhakāt vyāptisiddhiḥ | yat tadanyad apekṣyaṃ tad indriyam iti vyavasthā, tato na kriyātvena kāraṇānumānaṃ, nāpi pratyakṣaṃ vyāptigrāhi | avaśyaṃ ca svābhāvikavikalpāmukhīkṛtajātibhedapuraskāreṇaiva sāmānyagrahaṇam eṣitavyam adhyakṣasya, anyathā yadā pratyakṣeṇa vyāptim ekām uparad.śāyaṃ ghaṭa iti saṃketaḥ kriyate, tadā kim asau kāryatvādidharmayogi viśvam āviśati? vyabhicāradarśanena ca niyataviṣayatām upanīyate? upadeṣṭaiva vā sarvānyajātiṣu niṣedhan viṣayaniyame niṣṭṛāpayati? atha sāmānyaviṣaya eva nāsau samayaḥ?

column2: evaṃ vācakajātibhede 'pi draṣṭavyam | kāryaśabdas tu pratyakṣam anapekṣya vikalpamātragocarite parāpekṣodayamātre niveśita iti na viśeṣavṛttiḥ | yadi tu so 'pi pratyakṣavartinyayaṃ kārya iti niveśyeta, so 'pi tatparyāyāntaravān niyatavṛttir eva syāt | tasmāt kāyajātiviśeṣaviṣayīkaraṇam eva nisargaḥ pratyakṣasya | yadi ca kāryajātibhede pravṛttam api pratyakṣaṃ kāryamātram adhiṣṭhānīkaroti, kāraṇe tarhi pravartamānaṃ kāraṇamātram eva vyāpakam avadhārayatu, kasmād upādānādivedanaviśiṣṭam avalambate? tato yadi na bhavad abhiprāyānurodho 'dhyakṣasyobhayatra sāmānyāvalambinā viśeṣāvalambinā vā bhavitavyam anena, sāmānyālambane kāryāt kāraṇānumānam iti kā vārteśvarasiddheḥ? viśeṣāvalambane ca kāryamātravyāpter asiddher iti | tasmād anubhavād yuktaś ca viśiṣṭām eva kāryajātiṃ hetuviśeṣavyāptām uparad.śayati pratyakṣam iti | prayogaḥ | yad yat kārakāraṇabhāvagrāhi pratyakṣam, tad viśiṣṭajātipratiniyatavyāpāram, yathāgnidhūmayoḥ | tathā cedaṃ buddhimatā kāryasya vyāptisādhanam iti svabhāvahetuḥ | nāsyānyathāvyāpārāśaṅkayānekāntaḥ, kāraṇānupalabdhibādhitatvāt | kāraṇabhedo hi kāryabhedasya kāraṇam, anyathā sarvasyāhetukatvaprasaṅgāt | na cāsya kāraṇabhedo

column2: [251] 'sti, viṣayendriyālokādilakṣaṇasamānasāmagrīprabhavatvād iti | dṛṣṭānte sādhyaśūnyatāśaṅkāyāṃ ca yad yat pratyakṣam, tat tad viśiṣṭajātyaiva sāmānyāvalambanam, yathā vyabhicāragrāhi pratyakṣam, pratyakṣaṃ ca vyāptigrāhīti svabhāva eva | sa evānekāntaparihāraḥ | buddhimatkāryayog api vyāptigrāhiṇi dharmiṇy ayam eva vā prayogaḥ | athavobhayatrāpi yad yat sambandhagrāhi pratyakṣaṃ tad viśiṣṭajātyaiva, yathā vācyavācakayoḥ, sambandhagrāhi ca pratyakṣaṃ kāryakāraṇayor api pūrvavat | tad ayaṃ yadi tattvataḥ kṛtsno 'pi kāryagrāmaḥ prayatnavan nāntarīyakaḥ, tathāpi kāryajātīnām atyantavilakṣaṇānām ānantyāt, pratijātibhedaṃ ca vyāptigrahanāpekṣaṇāt, yāvaj jātikaṃ kāryaṃ puruṣapūrvakaṃ paricchinnam, tāvata eva tadanumānam āñjasam iti yuktam uktam

column2: ity ādi | tathā ca vahner eva (dhūmabhasmāṅgārapākapāradotsāraṇavīkṣaṇakṣatiprabhṛtiṣu) dhūmabhasmāṅgārapākapāradotsāraṇavīkṣaṇakṣatiprabhṛtiṣu kāryeṣu yatra yatraiva pratibandhasādhakam adhyakṣaṃ pravṛttam, tata eva tadanumānam, nānyasmāt | evaṃ devakulakalasaprāsādasyandanadukūlādiṣu vastuvṛttyā pauruṣeyeṣv api yajjātīyeṣv eva puruṣakriyopalabdhir āsīt, tajjātikād eva kāryāt tadanumānam anumanyāmahe | dhārādharadharādharādijātau punas tadvyāpārānavadhāraṇāt kānumānavārtā, jātivaijātyasyātyantikasya sambhavena vyāpter agrahāt? gṛhītavyāpteś ca kāryasyādarśanāt |

column2: kīdṛśī punaḥ kāryajātiḥ prayatnavatā vyāptetyāśaṅkya tasyā apy ānantyāt saṃkṣepārtham ucyate, yaddṛṣṭer arthakriyādarśino 'pi kṛtabuddhir bhavatīti | tatra ca kṛtabuddhir iti na sādhanabuddhiḥ, nāpy upādānādyabhijñalakṣaṇaprakṛtasādhyabuddhiḥ, kiṃ tu kuvindādisvabhāvasādhyabuddhiḥ | tadabhāvāc ca na sākṣādbhavadīyahetvasiddhiḥ prakṛtasādhyasiddhir vā vivakṣitā, kiṃ tu ātyantikavaijātyapradarśanam etat | taddvāreṇa ca hetor asiddhir avyāptir vābhimataiva |

column2: [252] tathā hi śūnyanagaraparidṛṣṭadevakulādau uklālādiśilpibuddhir (uklālādidamaśilpibuddhir) āvirasti, na malyamakarālayādau | tasyāḥ śilpibuddher bhāvābhāvau na jātibhedam ātyantikam antareṇa ity abhiprāyaḥ | vyatirekagrahaṇe smaraṇasaṃskārabhraṃśe vā devakulādāv api na syād iyaṃ samānaṃ śilpibuddhiḥ | tato yathā dhūmād agnibuddhir bhavantī gardabhādabhadantī dhūmād gardabhasya niyataṃ jātibhedam āpādayati, tatheyam api pariniścitapauruṣeyabhāvebhyo bhāvebhyaḥ kailāsakuliśādīnām |

column2: kathaṃ punar anumānābhāva eva pratyetavya iti cet, kumbhakārād ambhodadambhāliprabhṛtisambhava iti svapne 'pi śaṅkāvirahāt | anyathā kuvindapādamardanādanāvṛṣṭikaṣṭam āviśet na lokaḥ, paracakrākrāntikātaro vā kṣitidharajaladhivyarvādhamabhilkaṣaṃs tata eva nirvṛttim āsādayet | kuvindasthānīyas tatrāparo 'pekṣyata eveti cet, na, samāne kāryajanmani vijātīyakāraṇagaveṣaṇānupapatteḥ kuvindenaiva sādhyasiddheḥ | na hi paṭāntare api kuvindād aparasyāpekṣā |

column2: asti ca vastraviśeṣe viśiṣṭaśilpino 'pekṣeti cetasti, yāvad eva tu vastrāntareṇaikajātiparāmarśo dṛḍhaḥ, ata eva kuvindasyaiva śilpinaḥ kalpanam | tadvimarśābhāve pauruṣeyatāyā eva sandehaḥ | merumandarādayas tu na kenacit pauruṣeyeṇaikapratyavamarśabhājaḥ | tadeṣām adhyakṣasiddham atyantavaijātyaṃ śāṭhyād apahnavānaḥ samānaśilpy anumānaviraheṇa svīkāryate | siddhe ca jātibhede yādṛk kāryaṃ kumbhādi puruṣapratibaddhaṃ siddham, na tādṛggarbhārbhakādi | yādṛk cedaṃ na tādṛk puruṣavyāptim iti siddhā asiddhiḥ avyāptiś ca dvayoḥ | evaṃ ca sthite prakṛtasādhyabuddhyajananadvārāṇi dūṣaṇāni dūram apāstāni ||

column2: na hi vayaṃ prakṛtasādhyabuddher abhāvāt kāryatvādihetor asiddhiṃ brūmaḥ | kiṃ tarhi? mandarādau kuvindasamaśilpibuddherabhāvād ambarādisajātīyakāryatvāsiddhim | tataś ca prakṛtasādhyabuddhivaidhuryam iti na kaścid viśeṣaḥ | kuvindasādhyāpekṣayā ca vyāptigrahaṇasmaraṇasaṃskārabhraṃśa eveṣṭa iti na bhūṣaṇavikalpāvakāśaḥ | kṛtakatvamātrapratītis tu na vivakṣitaiva | abhraṣṭasmaraṇānāṃ tāvad bhavaty eva puruṣakṛtabuddhiḥ kṣityādiṣv iti tu dūram aprakṛṣṭam | bauddhakṛtasya hi kṛtabuddhiniṣedhasyāsiddhiḥ prastutā abhidhātum | na ca sā śakyā, kṛtabuddhiśabdena śilpibuddher asya vivakṣitatvāt | puruṣakṛtabuddhibhāvavibhāvanaṃ

column2: [253] punar anupayogi | pratīta eva tasmin dūṣaṇacinteyam | tatrāpy abhraṣṭasmaraṇānām ity asaṅgatam, atyantavaijātyasiddheḥ sindhvāder anyato na vyāptipratīteḥ, smaraṇasaṃskārabhraṃśasya parihartum aśakyatvāt | ata eva jagat kenacit sṛṣṭam iti pralāpamātre ka āśvāsaḥ? Prakṛtasādhyabuddhyāsiddhicodanaparihārād eva ca vedeṣvapīty ādi pratyādiṣṭam |

column2: yadi tu puruṣeyavākyāder atyantaṃ vedasya vaijātyam upadarśayet Mīmāṃsakaḥ, tat kiṃ samayamātreṇa parājetavyaḥ? na tu tayoḥ svarūpadvārakaḥ śaktidvārako vā kaścid viśeṣo 'sti | tathā ca tat dvayam agṛhītasaṃketasya puraḥ paṭhitvā pratīhi kasya kīdṛśaṃ viśeṣaṃ vyākurvīta śrotā, kiṃ na vā paśyasi garuḍādimantrakṛtaṃ viṣāpākaraṇādi? tad etad āyātam,

column2: yadi tat, kā kathā vicāragocarātītātyantikajātibhedeṣu kumbhād ambhodadambholiprabhṛtiṣu tajjātiniyatapratīteḥ pauruṣeyatāyāḥ? yad apy anityatāsādhanāyopālabdham, tad api nyāyabāhyam | pratyakṣeṇa pratibandhabodhādhikāre hi tādṛśī sajātīyetaratvamīmāṃsā | anityatve kṛtakatvamātrasya viparyayabādhakapramāṇād anumānasvabhāvāt prabidandhasiddhir iti na tatra jātiviśeṣānurodhaḥ | jātiviśeṣānavacchinne tu kṛtakamātre vyāptisādhanasamartham asamarthaṃ vā tat pramāṇam iti cintanīyam | śaktau na doṣasparśaḥ | ata eva tatra ghaṭaśabdabhedena bhedodbhāvanaṃ dṛṣṭāntadārṣṭāntikavaidharmyābhidhānam iti na yuktam | yato dharmirūpādākṛṣṭadharmadvayasya vyāptivyavasthāpanād dharmavastv eva dharmīti tadbhedābhidhānasya dharmimātrabheda evārthaḥ |

column2: [254] ihāpi tarhi kāryeṣu dharmiṣu pauruṣeyatvaṃ sādhyaṃ kāryatvamātraṃ hetur iti na viśeṣaḥ kaścid iti cet? ucyate, kāryatvamātraṃ hetur iti ko 'sya bhāṣitasyārthaḥ? kiṃ tāvan mukhyatayā dharmamātre kāraṇasya kuṅkumāder eva rāge vyāpārād evam ucyate? utasvit kātsnaryena kārye vyāptisiddheḥ, dhūmatvamātraṃ hetur itivat? yathā kṛtsno dhūmaḥ sādhyavyāptaḥ, tathā yāvat kāryaṃ tat kṛtsnaṃ puruṣavyāpārajanmakam iti niścayāt | tad etad ubhayam api nirastam | kṛtakatvamātram anityatvavyāptam iti tu kārtsnyapara eva bhāvanirdeśaḥ, yāvat kṛtakaṃ tat sarvam anityam ity ayam evārthaḥ | atrārthe pramāṇabale milite siddhe ca dhvaneḥ kṛtakatve ghaṭa eva kṛtako 'nityo dṛṣṭaḥ kathaṃ śabdaḥ syād iti niravakāśam evety ayam evārtho dharmimātrabhedo 'yam ity anayā rītyā prakāśyate |

column2: yathā hi svabhāvahetvadhikāraprastāvāt sādhyasādhanadharmau vikalpārūḍharūpāpekṣayā bhinnau vyavasthāpitau tathā dharmy api śabdādiḥ, anyasya taddharmaṇo 'bhāvāt | na cānyatra dharmiṇi kṛtakavastunā anityavastusādhane dhvaner anityatāsiddhiḥ | tasya ca dharmiṇo ghaṭaśabdabhāvena bhedamāpādayan dūṣaṇam abhidhāya nigṛhyate dharmimātrabhedadvāreṇa | prastute tu kāryahetvabhimānād dhūmasthānīyaḥ kāryarāśiḥ sādhyaś ca bhinno 'gnivat puruṣaḥ | kevalaṃ nāgnivat taddeśakāla eva | kiṃ tu janmadeśakāle sannihito niśceyaḥ, bhasmakumbhābhyām deśasannihitavyāpāraḥ kulālo niścīyate, ghaṛaś ca hetur vastutaḥ, tathā puruṣe 'pi sādhye vastv eva hetur na kāryatvadharmaḥ, tathā sati puruṣavyāptāt kāryād vilakṣaṇaṃ kṣoṇīdharādikāryāmati vadatā sādhanavaisadṛśyam udbhāvitam, na dharmivaisadṛśyam | tadā hi tadudayadeśakālam eva dharmi, na ca kalasādikāladeśāt kailāsādikāladeśavaisadṛśyaṃ kaścid vaktum upakrānto yena dharmivaisadṛśyodbhāvanaṃ bhavet |

column2: tasmād dahanarūpamātrād dahanānumānavat sādhanavaisadṛśyodbhāvanam etad asiddhim avyāptiṃ vā darśayituṃ dharmiṇa iti tu viplavaḥ pareṣām | ayam evārtho yādṛk kāryatvaṃ devakulādau puruṣavyāptaṃ pratītam, na tādṛg yugandharādāv ity anayā diśopadiśyate | yajjātīyaṃ devakulādi puruṣavyāptaṃ na tajjātīyaṃ yugandharādīty arthaḥ | atyantavaijātyāc ca kāryaśabdamātrasāmyam ucyate na punar kāryavyāvṛtteḥ kvacit nyūnabhāvaḥ | vyāptau tu kāryatvāder anantarbhāvaṃ brūmaḥ | ata eva tanmātreṇa sāmyaṃ nopayogi, mūrtatvādineva dahanānumāne |

column2: [255] mañjariyas tu paryanuyogo 'sthānapatitaḥ | ghaṭādijāniter eva puruṣavyāptā siddheti vadatāny atra saṃśayamātrasya vivakṣitatvāt | kulālādimanuṣyakṛtabuddhiś ca kṛtabuddhir uktā | tadabhāvaś ca jātibhede uttarīkṛtaḥ | sa cobhayasiddhatayā na visarjanāny avakāśayati | na cātyantikajātibhedam antareṇopapadyata iti niveditam |

column2: evaṃ Vācaspater api viśeṣagaveṣaṇaṃ kṛtabuddhivaidhuryasyābhidheyaprayojanayor aparijñānaprayuktam iti veditavyam | yadi hi kṛtabuddhir nāstīti prakṛtasādhyabuddhir nāstīti vivakṣitam, tadā pratītikalahe 'muṣmin kuto viśeṣād anyatra sā bhavati parvatādau tadabhāvān neti cintyate | yadā tu kṛtabuddhir nāstīti sāmānaśilpikṛtabuddhir nāstīty abhidheyam, tatra ca na vivādaḥ | prayojanaṃ ca kumbhādibhyo 'mbhodharāder atyantavaijātyakhyāpanam | tad apy aśakyaparihāram | tato gṛhītavyāptikebhyo 'tyantavilakṣaṇāt kathaṃ prakṛtasādhyabuddhir ity abhipretam? tadā plavata eva sakalam evaṃvidham | utpattimanmātre ca vyāptinirasanāt hantotpattimad ityādy uttaraṃ kāladaṇḍakhaṇḍitam eva | tena ghaṭe dṛṣṭavyāptikasya ghaṭasajātīyam eva buddhimatpūṛvakam | yadā tu prāsādādāv api vyāptigrahas tadā tajjāter api tatpūrvakatvasiddhir ity apy uktam |

column2: yaccā (yaccātha) yajjātīyam ity āśaṅkya kiṃ kāryajātīyam? tathā na dṛṣṭam ity uttaram, tad api svābhāvikavikalpāvabhāsinaḥ sāmānyasya pratyakṣeṇa vyāptigrahaṇayogyatāsamarthanāt kadarthitam | tasmād yad api aupādhikavikalpapratibhāsināpi rūpeṇa tajjātīyavyavahāro duṣparihāraḥ, vyāptigrahaṇe tu pratikṣiptatvān mahān viśeṣa iti |

column2: ata eva vittokavikalpā api na kiñcit | tathā hi, yady asmadabhiprāyapraśnaḥ, tadā viśiṣṭaiva kāryajātir devakulakalasādilakṣaṇā buddhimadvyāptā yaddṛṣṭer hi parokṣakriyasyāpy anubhūtasajātīyaśilpyanumānam, sā na siddhā sindhubhūdharādau | kāryatvamātraṃ tu na vyāptam ity uccais tarāṃ tanvanta evāsmahe | tatra kim ebhir vikalpair iti cintaya | yadviśeṣād viśiṣṭā kāryajātiḥ sa viśeṣaḥ kim anirūpitarūpa evety api pāpīyaḥ, pratyakṣasiddhānāṃ kāryajātīnāṃ parasparavaisadṛśyasyāpahnotum aśakyatvāt | vyāptis tu viśiṣṭāyāṃ jātau bhavatu kāryamātre vety atra paramāpātato vimantum arhati | katham anyathā svayam api vastutvasyāgnikāryatvāsaṃjananaṃ vyabhicāram ālambya parihṛtam? vyabhicārabuddhīnāṃ niyatajātiviṣayatve vivādābhāvād ity āvirbhāvitam eva | tasmād ākārārthakriyāsāmarthādivedanāt

column2: yad api prācīnam upādānodāharaṇam asya kāryamātre vyāptisamīhayā, tad api naupayikam, tatrāpi pratyakṣavyāpārasyāśakyasādhanatvāt, naisargikavikalpaviṣayatvāt, upādānasya dṛśyādṛśyasvabhāvatvāc ca | tat kim idānīm upādānena kāryarāśer vyāptir eva nāsti? āhosvit pramāṇāntaragamyā bhavatv iti cet? ubhayatra saṃśayaḥ, sato 'pi vyabhicārasya viparyayabādhakānumānasya hānullekhasaṃbhavād idānīm ekāntahetor abhāvāt | tad ayaṃ sopādānaṃ sarvotpattir iti sarvatantrasiddhānto 'virodhād anuvṛttaḥ, yāvac ca kāryam ālokayāmas tāvad upādānavadevety avigānena vyavahāro 'pi | na ca kāryaparyantabodhaḥ pṛthagjanasyeti tanīyasāpi viparītāṃśena saṃśayo durvāraḥ | buddheś ca buddhir upādānaṃ niścitā iti vijñānasya vijñānānupādānāc (vijñānānyānupādānāc) ca sidhyatīti na virudhyate, tato yadi siddhāntād api tadvyāptivyavasāyo na kācit kṣatiḥ | pratyakṣāt tu mā bhūt, kevalam atra pakṣe 'cetanopādānatvahetur ekadeśasiddhaḥ śaṅkyeteti vyavasthā | sā cāyātaiva, kiṃ kriyatām? viparyayabādhakapramāṇalābhe tu sāpi na syāt | kevalaṃ pratyakṣeṇa kṛtsnakāryavyāptivāde 'nudāharaṇam evedam | ataḥ pratyakṣasya jātiviśeṣe vyāpāraniyamaprasādhanād viśeṣahetvabhāvād ity ādy api dhvastam?

column2: yat punar aparasya viparyayabādhakapramāṇopanyāsapauruṣam, tatrāpi prathamadvitayaṃ tāvad bādhakaṃ dhūmasyeva siddhāyām eva tadutpattau tatsādhakapratyakṣānupalambhasya viśiṣṭajātyadhikāreṇa pravṛttisādhanād viśiṣṭam eva ghaṭādikāryaṃ prati śakyam | evaṃ ca yadi buddhimantam antareṇa jāyeta sakṛd api tato na bhavet, aniyatahetutve vāhetutvam iti na kāryamātraṃ prati, tasya puruṣād utpattiprasādhanābhāvāt | tataś ca tat kāryaṃ yat puruṣapūrvam ity api niravakāśam ||

column2: nāpi kāryāvirāmaprasaṅgasaṅgatiḥ, svakāraṇāyattasannidher adṛṣṭapariṇāmasahakāriṇaḥ kāraṇāvasthāviśeṣasya satatam abhāve 'pi kāryāṇāṃ kādācitkatopapatteḥ, yad apekṣayā nityaśakter api īśvarasya śaśvan na karaṇam (karaṇatvam) | ekāvasthāniyame hi kāraṇāntarāṇāṃ pravṛttinivṛttisādhanīcchā prārthyeta | sa ca nāsti, bījasyocchūnataratamādibhāvavat pariṇāmaparamparāparicayasya

column2: [257] teṣām apahnotum aśakyatvāt | astu vā ekāvasthāniyama īśvarasya icchāyā api nityatvāt tadavasthaḥ kāryāvirāmaḥ, anitye tu yadapekṣo 'syāḥ kadācit bhāvaḥ, tad apekṣayā kāryagrāmasya yadi syāt kīdṛśo doṣaḥ? kumbhādikāryakrame 'pi tarhi kiṃ puruṣecchayā, yadapekṣo 'syāḥ kramaḥ, tadapekṣa eva kumbhāder apy astīti vaktuṃ śakteḥ? tad ayuktam, pramāṇena dṛṣṭasāmarthyasya hetor apohitum aśakyatvāt | prastute tu pramāṇābhāvāt kāryakādācitkatāmātram āśritaṃ tadanyathāpy upapatsyata iti kutaḥ puruṣāpattiniyamaḥ kāryasya?

column2: yac cocyate, kāraṇasannidher dhīdhanādhīno niścita iti, tatrāpi tathā darśanamātrāśraye etad eva vācyam | viparyayabādhakaṃ ca na kiñcid uktam | pratyakṣānupalambhaśaraṇīkaraṇe ca vātopadhātādimilajjambālabījādisāmagryā anaikāntikatvād sarvam āpekṣaparihārasametaṃ kāryavad avagantavyaṃ sāmagrīviśeṣa eva vyāptiyogya ity etat paryantam | tan na kāraṇasāmagryāḥ puruṣeṇa vyāptisiddhaḥ, yato vipakṣe vyāpakānupalambhād asambhava iti caturtham api kadarthitam ||

column2: tāvataiva Vācaspater api hṛdayaśūnyaḥ pralāpo 'pahastitaḥ | yathā hi vitatānāṃ tāvad ajananabījamuktam avasthāviśeṣābhāvo nāma | yady api daṇḍacakrādīnāṃ puruṣād eva milanam upalabdhaṃ tatprayatnasacivānāṃ ca kāryārambhaḥ, tathāpi sarvatra sarvadā vā tathaiveti niyamayituḥ pramāṇasyābhāvāt kāryotpādavyāpakasyāpi kāraṇasamavadhānasya buddhimad adhīnatvena vyāptyasiddhes tadavastho doṣaḥ | yathā ca kāraṇāntaradaśāviśeṣāśrayeṇaiva kāryāṇāṃ kadācid bhāvas tathā prakṛtiviśeṣo 'pīti pañcamaṃ ca pañcatām añcitam ||

column2: [258] 'pi viśeṣa evāmeṣitavyaḥ śakteḥ, katham anyathā kāryavaijātyam ātyantikam? tad asau śaktiḥ prayatnavad apekṣāvaimukhyam api yadi kṣameta kā kṣatiḥ? kiṃ ca kartur api karādivyāpāram antareṇa samīhāmātrāt na mūrtakāryasiddhir upalabdhā, tam ativartamānānāṃ bhūdharādīnāṃ kā gaṇanā samīhāmātre?

column2: kārādayo 'pi samīhayā pravartyanta iti cet? samīhāpi sanniveśini śayādivyāpāravirahe na kiñcitkarīty uktam | tato yayā śaktyā karādivyāpārapāravaśyamapāsya mahīdharādihetavo nirabhiprāyatve saty api na kāryakarmaṇi pratihanyante, tayā samīhām api nātikrameyur iti ka evaṃ śraddadhīta? na hi dhūmodayakāle ucchaladbahalarūpaṃ vastu vahnīndhanajanyatayā sambhāvitam ekābhāvaniścaye niścīyamānam anyābhāve 'pi na bhāvaśaṅkāyāṃ niveśyati, tādṛg etad api ||

column2: śarīrasvīkāre tu prādeśikakāryānityānekāsarvajñatvāt sādhu sādhitaḥ sudhībhirīśvaraḥ | etenaiva vā vyabhicāraḥ kāryatvādeḥ | na hy anadhiṣṭhitānām ity ādicanād (ādivacanād) darśanādarśanamātrād anyam upāyam asya vyāptisādhanāya spṛśati, tac ca kṛtottaram | yadi ca darśanādarśanam eva śaraṇam, tadā yathā samīhāvataḥ kāryakriyā dṛṣṭeti kārye sati samīhāvato 'numānam iṣṭam, tathā karādimata eva mūrtakriyā dṛṣṭeti karādivyāpāranupapattau puruṣasyākriyaiva kasmāt na niścīyate? na khalu kāryahetuvyāpakānupalambhayoḥ prāmāṇye kaścid viśeṣaḥ | yadi tu darśanādarśanamātramanāsthāya pramāṇāntaram ekaniyataṃ syāt, syād ekasādhyabuddhiḥ, tadabhāve tu pratibandha eva tayoḥ parasparam, na bādhā tulyakakṣatvād iti prakaraṇasamaḥ parābhiprāyāt |

column2: prayogaḥ, yo na svāṅgavyāpāravān nāsau mūrtanirvartanasamartho dṛṣṭaḥ, yathā kulāla eva saṃhṛtakarādivyāpāradaśāyām | nāsti ca svāṅgavyāpāraḥ prakṛte puṃsīti vyāpakānupalabdhiḥ | nāśrayāsiddhiḥ kṣaṇabhaṅgādhyāyanyāyeneti vastutas tarhi dūṣaṇāntaram eva yuktaṃ, kaḥ pratihetor avakāśa iti cet, na, bhūyodarśanasya vyāptisiddhāv anaṅgatvapratipādanārtham asyopanyāsāt | yadi bhūyodarśanam upāyaḥ tadaivam api syād ity ukter iti vyāptigrahaprakārāṇām ayogād anekānta iti sthitam |

column2: atha bahūnāṃ vyāhatamanasāṃ vyāpāre kāryasyānutpattir upanyasya vilopādiprasaṅgaś ca syād iti cet? pratyekaṃ vaibhavādiguṇayogād īśvarāṇāṃ vyāpāre syād apīyam āśaṅkā, adya punar eko 'pi tādṛṇ na sidhyatīty ucyate | arvācīnaśaktayaś ca bhūyāṃsa ekam anekaṃ ca kāryam ārabhya niṣpādayanto dṛśyanta eva | nanv anekatrāpi pradhānabhūtenaikena bhāvyam, balīyasā vā, sūtradhāravat, senānīvad vā | atas tasyaiva kartṛtvam itareṣāṃ tadanuvṛttitvād iti cet, na, tatrāpi niyamābhāvāt, svasvaprayojanānurodhena svatantrāṇām api keṣāñcid ekasattvādighaṭanādarśanāt | tatrāpi kaścid eva prathamaḥ prayojaka ity api nāsti, anekasya tathā hṛdayotkalikāyā anivāraṇāt, nīcasyāpi prayojakatvasambhavāt |

column2: tasmād bhramaramadhumakṣikāvalmīkajantuvat kṣudraprāṇibhir apy ekaikam ainākādikaraṇasambhāvanāyāṃ kā vārtā viśvasyaikena kriyāyāḥ? tatrādṛṣṭajanmānas tāvat tāvataiva kṛtārthīkṛtacetanānumitayaḥ kṣitir adharādayaḥ | te ca kṣudrajantava upādānam atikṣudraṃ pṛthvyādidravyam upakaraṇaṃ sukhādisampradānam ātmanaṃ sthitisukhādi ca prayojanaṃ jānanta eva valmīkajantuvat pravarteran | siddhe ca nāvaśyam adhiṣṭhāyakā dṛśyeran, vicitraśaktikarmāpekṣāt svabhāvaviprakarṣād vā | ye 'pi dṛṣṭajanyamāno vṛkṣādayaḥ pauruṣeyāḥ, tatra cintaiva nāsti | adṛṣṭapuruṣavyāpārās tu ye bindhyayugandharādiparisaradbhāvās te 'pi piśācādiprakārair adhitṛbhir (adhiṣṭhātṛbhir) asaṃkhyaiḥ kartṛmanta iti kaḥ sarvavedī bhavatu? deśakālayoś ca bhinnā evepri kva vibhutvanityatve? na caivaṃ śaṅkāyā bādhakaṃ kiñcid asti vastubalapravṛttam anumānam |

column2: nanu caivaṃ tāvad bhavadbhir api na svīkṛtam eva | etāvac cātikaṣṭataraṃ kalpanayo varam īśvarakalpanaiva lāghavād iti cet? satyam, yadi kalpanāmātretaranyāsaḥ, tadā bhavad upanyāsam eva puraskariṣyāmaḥ | yāvat punar anumānavyājaṃ na varjayasi, tāvad avaśyam asmākaṃ dṛḍhanirūpaṇābhiyogaḥ | atha kṣudrair asaṃkhyair nirmitā narmadādaya iti dunoti cetaś cet? ekenāśarīreṇa nirmitā iti suṣṭutarām | tasmāt pramāṇam eva sarvato balavad yathā sthāpayati tathārthasthitiḥ | ata eva tad dṛḍhaṃ nirūpyate | na ca kṣudreṣv anurodhaḥ kaścit |

column2: nāpi bauddhais tathānupagamāt ato hetuvyāvṛttiḥ, ekato 'pi vyāvṛttiprasaṅgāt | na ca vastubalapravṛtte 'numāne paropagamāpekṣā | upagamamātrasya tyāgenāvirodhāt | tad evaṃ buddhimanmātre sādhye upādānādyabhijñatālakṣaṇaviśeṣanāntarīyakatayā sākṣād upādānādyabhijñakartṛsādhanād vābhimatasiddhir naikāntikī, sarvakāryakriyāyā ekakartṛtvasiddheḥ | upādānādyabhijñamātrasādhane ca vaiphalyam, bhāratādikathāvat | tataḥ sādhanāntarābhāvād asmād eva sarvajñādiguṇavataḥ siddhir iṣṭeti tadapekṣyaiva dūṣaṇam abhidhānīyam anekāntalakṣaṇam iti sthitam |

column2: ato yāvatīm arthagatim ityādi durlaṅghyam | sādhyasāmānyapratibandhākṛṣṭatve 'pi viśeṣasya siddhiḥ sādhanādhīnaiva, tadekaparatayā sādhanopanyāsād anyasādhanābhāvāc ca | bauddhasyāpi hi nairātmyasiddhiḥ sādhanādhīnaiva | yadi hi nairātmyatyāge tpi kṣaṇabhaṅgasādhanaṃ caritārthaṃ bhavet, tadā kiṃ kṣaṇabhāṇasādhane nairātmyasiddhiḥ syāt? bhavatas tu sārvajñyādisiddhim uddhūyānyathāpy upādānādyabhijñānalakṣaṇo viśeṣa upapāditaḥ | ata eva nātmopanyāsapūrvako 'nvayo dṛṣṭānte pradarśyate iti anupayuktam | sākṣāt tadanvayadarśane api tannāntarīyakatvaṃ sādhyasāmānyasya darśayitavyam eva | taccaikatvena sakalakriyādhārasya vyāpter abhāvād aśakyam |

column2: etenaiva Vācaspatyo 'pi sārvajñyasādhanābhinayaḥ prativyūḍhaḥ | siddhe tu sarvajñe kartāri kartur ekatvanirūpaṇaśramo smākam anuyogīty (anupayogīty) uparamyate | yad apy ayaṃ vyatirekiprayogam āha, tad apy ekatvāniścayād eva dūṣitam, anityāsarvaviṣayabuddhitve 'py upādānādivedanasambhavasyopapāditatvāt |

column2: vittokasamādhāne tu dhūmād dharādharāvyavacchedavat (dharādharāyogavyavacchedavat) agneḥ pañcavarṇaśikhākalāpatāyā apy anumānaprasaṅgaḥ | nātra sāmarthyam iti cet? tatrāpi pakṣāyogavyavaccheda eva sāmarthyāt | pṛthvībhṛti prayatnavataḥ siddhāv apy ekatvāniścayāt kva sarvavedanasiddhiḥ?

column2: [261] tathā na bhavāmaḥ? tad avaśyaṃ kartātīndriyadarśī svīkriyamāṇo neśvarād anyo yuktaḥ | tad api yat kiñcit | na hi māṃsacakṣuṣṭve tpi sarvasādhāraṇaṃ karaṇasāmarthyam, asmad atyantam apakṛṣṭānām api gṛghrādīnām indriyapāṭavātiśayadarśanāt | kṣodiṣṭhānām eva ca keṣāñcit paramāṇudarśanam api syāt karmaśaktiviśeṣāt, yathā pipīlikānām asmad agocaragandhāṇugrahaṇam | na ca tanmātrasūkṣmam īkṣamāṇair deśakālaviprakṛṣṭasyāpi sūkṣmāntarasya grahaṇam, sakalasthūlasya vā? tan na tāvataiveśvarasiddhipratyāśā |

column2: evaṃ tarhi bhavatu paramāṇor darśanasambhāvanā sakalakṣetrajñatatsamavetadharmādharmāśayaviśeṣāṇāṃ tu katham? na kathañcit | na hi kāryakriyā kṣetrajñasvarūpādiparijñānenāpi vyāptā kulāladṛṣṭānte dṛṣṭā, kiṃ tu sampradānopakaraṇavedanadvāreṇa tadākṛṣṭir iṣyate | sā cāśakyā, sāmarthyānupapatteḥ, uktakrameṇāpi tanmātravedanasya caritārthatvāt | karmaṇi svasyābhipreyamāṇatvena sampradānatāyā durvāratvāt; yathā svasmai mandiraṃ karotīti | anyathā tenaiva vyabhicāraprasaṅgaḥ sampradānajñānāpekṣāyāḥ |

column2: anumīyamānas tatrāparaḥ sampradānavedī bhaviṣyatīti cet, na, vyabhicāradarśanena kartuḥ sampradānajñānāntarīyakatvāsiddher anumānavārtāvirahāt | na cānumīyamānāpekṣayā tasyākartṛtvam | evaṃ hi kulālasyāpy akartṛtvaprasaṅge kartṛtve, svātmāpi sampradānam eṣitavyaḥ | na ca param api sampradānaṃ vyavahāraprasiddham uddhūya kṣetrarūpam asau jñātum īśaḥ karmāśayabhedārthopakaraṇaśabdasaṃgṛhītān api | tato yathā kulālas tān aviddhān daṇḍacakrādivedanenaivopakaraṇajñaḥ, tathānumīyamānā api jantavaḥ svakīyakaramukhādijñānenāpy ante bhaviṣyanti |

column2: tat kutastyam etat kṣetrajñarūpatadīyadharmādharmāśayabhedaparijñānam? athāśarīrasya kva svāṅgavyāpārasaṅgatiḥ? aśarīrasya siddhisaṅgatir api kīdṛśī? ekatve hi siddhe śarīrī prādeśiko na sarvakarmaṇi samartha iti sāmarthyād aśarīrisiddhipratyāśā, ekatvaṃ ca duṛsādhanam ity uktam | na cāśarīratve tpi daṇḍacakramukhādyupakaraṇānupapatteḥ pāriśeṣyāt karmāśayabhedajñānenaivopakaraṇajñānaniṣṭheti sauṣṭhvāya | dikkālasamavāyāder apy upakaraṇasaṃgṛhītasya jñānena tajjñatāmātrasya kṛtārthatvāt |

column2: [262] tāvat kartrāvaśyaṃ jñeyam iti dṛṣṭam | na ca digādijñānenaivopakaraṇavittis tadavasthasyeti niścayaṃ brūmo yato viśeṣaparyanuyogaḥ, kiṃ tūpakaraṇāntarasambhavān na pāriśeṣyaviśrāntiḥ atrety ucyate | tato yathā parāparakartṛṣś daṇḍacakrāditurīvemādyupakaraṇavirahaparamparāyām anyānyair upakaraṇair dharmādibāhyair upakaraṇajñatāsthitir upalabdhā, tathā kimadyāpy astu? uta dharmādīnādāyaiveti sandeha eva | yadi punar anyad upakaraṇaṃ na syāt pāriśeṣyavyākhyānaṃ śobheta | abhyudayaniṛśreyasamārgādisandehe ca kiṃ tādṛśā tena kartavyam īśvarābhidhānena dhanavirahiṇeva?

column2: tasmād aśarīratve tpi na dharmādijñānākṛṣṭiḥ, kiṃ punas tadasiddhau? mā bhūd upakaraṇatayā dharmāder vedayitā niyamena kāryatayā bhaviṣyati, yataḥ kartā kāryarūpādivedakaḥ sa ceśvara ity api niṛsāram | dānahiṃsādikaṃ hi kurvantas tad vedayanta eva svarūpamātreṇa, na tāvatā ta eveśvarāḥ | na cānyaḥ kārtsnyena tadvedī siddhaḥ | dharmādharmatvena tu niścayaḥ tatkāriṇo tpi nāvaśyam bhāvī kumbhakāravat | tatkāriṇāṃ tarhi tattvena niścayābhāvāt tattvaniścayaḥ kāryatvāt kartāram īśvaram eva sannidhāpayed ity api nāsti | dharmādharmatvaniścayo tpi hi samīcīnaḥ sandigdhasattāka eva vartate | kathaṃ tataḥ pratyāśā? anirastaviparyayāśaṅkasaṃkalpasvabhāvas tu bhūyasāmāgamadvāreṇa | devajātismarādisvīkārāc ca teṣām apy asti leśena samyakkarmaphalasambandhabodhaḥ | na ca tāvataivaiśvaryaparyāptir iti | tad evam īśvarāsiddheḥ sakalajanmināṃ śubhāśubhakarmāṇi nopakaraṇam, kiṃ tu kāraṇāny eva lokavaicitryasyeti dhīmatām upādeyaḥ prathamaślokārtha iti ||
